name: Telescorcher
description:
Telescorcher is a fast-paced 2D top-down shooter game demo with minimal UI, teleport movement, charge shooting mechanic and big enemy hordes. You have a scifi gun with two firing modes. When you stop firing, your health will regenerate depending on how much enemies you have killed. Shoot enemies, gather various pick-ups, avoid being killed and gain high scores

CONTROLS:
W, S, A & D: Movement
MOUSE: Aim
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON (hold): Shoot
RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON (hold): Teleport
ESC: Pause menu
